TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlCommandBuilder extends System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class SqlCommandBuilder Inherits DbCommandBuilder
public ref class SqlCommandBuilder sealed : System::Data::Common::DbCommandBuilder

summary.span: 自动生成单表命令，用于将对 所做的更改与关联的 SQL Server 数据库的更改相协调。

span.span: Automatically generates single-table commands that are used to reconcile changes made to a with the associated SQL Server database.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会自动生成将对的更改与 SQL Server 的关联实例进行协调所需的 transact-sql 语句。 The does not automatically generate the Transact-SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a with the associated instance of SQL Server. 但是, 如果设置了的 属性, 则可以创建一个对象来自动为单表更新生成 transact-sql 语句。However, you can create a object to automatically generate Transact-SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the property of the . 然后, 将生成未设置的任何其他 transact-sql 语句。Then, any additional Transact-SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the . 只要设置属性, 就会将自身注册为事件侦听器。The registers itself as a listener for events whenever you set the property. 一次只能将一个或对象彼此关联。You can only associate one or object with each other at one time. 若要生成 INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句, 请 使用属性来自动检索所需的元数据集。To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the uses the property to retrieve a required set of metadata automatically. 如果在检索元数据后更改 (例如, 在第一次更新之后), 则应调用方法来更新元数据。If you change the after the metadata has been retrieved, such as after the first update, you should call the method to update the metadata. `SelectCommand` 还必须至少返回一个主键或唯一列。The `SelectCommand` must also return at least one primary key or unique column. 如果没有, 则生成**InvalidOperation**异常, 且不生成命令。If none are present, an **InvalidOperation** exception is generated, and the commands are not generated. 还使用引用的 、和属性。 The also uses the , , and properties referenced by the . 如果修改了其中一个或多个属性, 则用户应调用, 或者是否替换自身。The user should call if one or more of these properties are modified, or if the itself is replaced. 否则, 、 和属性将保留其以前的值。Otherwise the , , and properties retain their previous values. 如果调用 , 将从解除关联, 并且不再使用生成的命令。If you call , the is disassociated from the , and the generated commands are no longer used. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 和来从数据源中选择行。The following example uses the , along and , to select rows from a data source. 该示例传递了一个连接字符串、一个查询字符串 (即 Transact-sql SELECT 语句) 和一个作为数据库表的名称的字符串。The example is passed a connection string, a query string that is a Transact-SQL SELECT statement, and a string that is the name of the database table. 然后, 该示例创建一个。The example then creates a . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlCommandBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommandBuilder/CS/Source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlCommandBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommandBuilder/VB/Source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将自身注册为在此属性中指定的生成的事件侦听器。The registers itself as a listener for events that are generated by the specified in this property. 当你创建的新实例时, 将释放与此关联的任何现有 。When you create a new instance of , any existing associated with this is released.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void DeriveParameters(class System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand command) cil managed
Public Shared Sub DeriveParameters (command As SqlCommand)

param.name: command
param.span: 引用将从其中导出参数信息的存储过程的 。

span.span: The referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.

param.span: 将派生参数添加到 的 集合中。

span.span: The derived parameters are added to the collection of the .

summary.span: 从在 中指定的存储过程中检索参数信息并填充指定的 对象的 集合。

span.span: Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the and populates the collection of the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DeriveParameters`覆盖的`SqlDbCommand`任何现有参数信息。`DeriveParameters` overwrites any existing parameter information for the `SqlDbCommand`. `DeriveParameters`需要对数据库进行额外的调用以获取信息。`DeriveParameters` requires an additional call to the database to obtain the information. 如果事先知道了参数信息, 则通过显式设置信息更有效地填充参数集合。If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly. 只能与存储过程`DeriveParameters`一起使用。You can only use `DeriveParameters` with stored procedures. 不能对`DeriveParameters`扩展存储过程使用。You cannot use `DeriveParameters` with extended stored procedures. 不能使用`DeriveParameters`来填充任意 transact-sql 语句, 如参数化 SELECT 语句。You cannot use `DeriveParameters` to populate the with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[配置参数和参数数据类型](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md).

exception.span: 此命令文本不是一个有效的存储过程名。

span.span: The command text is not a valid stored procedure name.

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

summary.span: 获取自动生成的、对数据库执行删除操作所需的 对象。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform deletions on the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用方法进行信息性或故障排除, 因为它返回要执行的对象。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您还可以将用作修改后的命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如, 你可以调用并修改值, 然后在上显式设置该值。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 首次生成 SQL 语句后, 如果应用程序以任何方式更改语句, 则必须显式调用。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则, 仍将使用前一语句中的信息, 这可能是不正确的。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 当应用程序调用或时, 将首先生成 SQL 语句。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 有关详细信息, 请参阅[通过 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand GetDeleteCommand(bool useColumnsForParameterNames) cil managed
Public Function GetDeleteCommand (useColumnsForParameterNames As Boolean) As SqlCommand

param.name: useColumnsForParameterNames
param.span: 如果为 ，则生成与列名匹配的参数名（如果可能）。

span.span: If , generate parameter names matching column names if possible.

param.span: 如果为 ，则生成 @p1、@p2，以此类推。

span.span: If , generate @p1, @p2, and so on.

summary.span: 获取自动生成的、对数据库执行删除操作所需的 对象。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object that is required to perform deletions on the database.

returns.span: 自动生成的、执行删除操作所需的 对象。

span.span: The automatically generated object that is required to perform deletions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用方法进行信息性或故障排除, 因为它返回要执行的对象。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您还可以将用作修改后的命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如, 你可以调用并修改值, 然后在上显式设置该值。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 首次生成 SQL 语句后, 如果应用程序以任何方式更改语句, 则必须显式调用。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则, 仍将使用前一语句中的信息, 这可能是不正确的。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 当应用程序调用或时, 将首先生成 SQL 语句。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 生成参数名称时, 默认行为是对各种参数使用`@p1`、 `@p2`等。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use `@p1`, `@p2`, and so on for the various parameters. 通过`true` 为参数传递, 可以强制根据列名生成参数。 `useColumnsForParameterNames`Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 仅当满足以下条件时, 此操作才会成功:This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 已指定从**GetSchema**方法调用返回并在集合中找到的, 其长度等于或大于生成的参数名称。The returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 生成的参数名称满足在**GetSchema**方法调用返回的中指定的条件 , 并在集合正则表达式中找到。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection regular expression. - 指定了从**GetSchema**方法调用返回的 , 并在集合中找到了。A returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection is specified. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[通过 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

summary.span: 获取自动生成的、对数据库执行插入操作所需的 对象。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object that is required to perform insertions on the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用方法进行信息性或故障排除, 因为它返回要执行的对象。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您还可以将用作修改后的命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如, 你可以调用并修改值, 然后在上显式设置该值。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 首次生成 transact-sql 语句后, 如果应用程序以任何方式更改语句 , 则必须显式调用。After the Transact-SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则, 仍将使用前一语句中的信息, 这可能是不正确的。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 当应用程序调用或时, 将首先生成 transact-sql 语句。The Transact-SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 有关详细信息, 请参阅[通过 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

已指定从**GetSchema**方法调用返回并在集合中找到的, 其长度等于或大于生成的参数名称。The returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 指定了从**GetSchema**方法调用返回的 , 并在集合中找到了。A returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection is specified. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[通过 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

summary.span: 获取自动生成的、对数据库执行更新操作所需的 对象。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform updates on the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用方法进行信息性或故障排除, 因为它返回要执行的对象。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您还可以将用作修改后的命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如, 你可以调用并修改值, 然后在上显式设置该值。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 首次生成 transact-sql 语句后, 如果应用程序以任何方式更改语句 , 则必须显式调用。After the Transact-SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则, 仍将使用前一语句中的信息, 这可能是不正确的。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 当应用程序调用或时, 将首先生成 transact-sql 语句。The Transact-SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 有关详细信息, 请参阅[通过 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand GetUpdateCommand() cil managed

summary.span: 获取自动生成的、对数据库执行更新操作所需的 对象。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform updates on the database.

returns.span: 自动生成的、执行更新所需的 对象。

span.span: The automatically generated object that is required to perform updates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用方法进行信息性或故障排除, 因为它返回要执行的对象。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您还可以将用作修改后的命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如, 你可以调用并修改值, 然后在上显式设置该值。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 首次生成 transact-sql 语句后, 如果应用程序以任何方式更改语句 , 则必须显式调用。After the Transact-SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则, 仍将使用前一语句中的信息, 这可能是不正确的。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 当应用程序调用或时, 将首先生成 transact-sql 语句。The Transact-SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 有关详细信息, 请参阅[通过 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand GetUpdateCommand(bool useColumnsForParameterNames) cil managed
Public Function GetUpdateCommand (useColumnsForParameterNames As Boolean) As SqlCommand

param.name: useColumnsForParameterNames
param.span: 如果为 ，则生成与列名匹配的参数名（如果可能）。

span.span: If , generate parameter names matching column names if possible.

param.span: 如果为 ，则生成 @p1、@p2，以此类推。

span.span: If , generate @p1, @p2, and so on.

summary.span: 获取自动生成的、对数据库执行更新操作所需的 对象。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform updates on the database.

returns.span: 自动生成的、执行更新所需的 对象。

span.span: The automatically generated object required to perform updates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用方法进行信息性或故障排除, 因为它返回要执行的对象。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您还可以将用作修改后的命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如, 你可以调用并修改值, 然后在上显式设置该值。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 首次生成 transact-sql 语句后, 如果应用程序以任何方式更改语句 , 则必须显式调用。After the Transact-SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则, 仍将使用前一语句中的信息, 这可能是不正确的。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 当应用程序调用或时, 将首先生成 transact-sql 语句。The Transact-SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 生成参数名称时, 默认行为是对各种参数使用`@p1`、 `@p2`等。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use `@p1`, `@p2`, and so on for the various parameters. 通过`true` 为参数传递, 可以强制根据列名生成参数。 `useColumnsForParameterNames`Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 仅当满足以下条件时, 此操作才会成功:This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 已指定从**GetSchema**方法调用返回并在集合中找到的, 其长度等于或大于生成的参数名称。The returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 生成的参数名称满足在**GetSchema**方法调用返回的中指定的条件 , 并在集合正则表达式中找到。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection regular expression. - 指定了从**GetSchema**方法调用返回的 , 并在集合中找到了。A returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the collection is specified. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[通过 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

.method public hidebysig virtual instance string QuoteIdentifier(string unquotedIdentifier) cil managed
Public Overrides Function QuoteIdentifier (unquotedIdentifier As String) As String

param.name: unquotedIdentifier
param.span: 不带引号的原始标识符。

span.span: The original unquoted identifier.

summary.span: 给定了具有正确的目录大小写设置且不带引号的标识符时，返回该标识符的正确的带引号形式。

span.span: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier.

summary.span: 这包括正确地转义该标识符中的任何嵌入引号。

span.span: This includes correctly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
The quoted version of the identifier.

returns.span: 标识符内的嵌入引号被正确地转义。

span.span: Embedded quotes within the identifier are correctly escaped.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string QuotePrefix { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property QuotePrefix As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ QuotePrefix { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.QuotePrefix : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在指定其名称中包含空格或保留标记等字符的 SQL Server 数据库对象（如表或列）时使用的一个或多个起始字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the starting character or characters to use when specifying SQL Server database objects, such as tables or columns, whose names contain characters such as spaces or reserved tokens.

value.span: 要使用的一个或多个起始字符。

span.span: The starting character or characters to use.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 虽然在生成 insert、 update 或 delete 命令后无法更改或属性, 但你可以在调用 DataAdapter 的`Update`方法之后更改其设置。Although you cannot change the or properties after an insert, update, or delete command has been generated, you can change their settings after calling the `Update` method of a DataAdapter.

exception.span: 在生成 INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE 命令后，不能更改此属性。

span.span: This property cannot be changed after an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE command has been generated.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string QuoteSuffix { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property QuoteSuffix As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ QuoteSuffix { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.QuoteSuffix : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在指定其名称中包含空格或保留标记等字符的 SQL Server 数据库对象（如表或列）时使用的一个或多个结束字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the ending character or characters to use when specifying SQL Server database objects, such as tables or columns, whose names contain characters such as spaces or reserved tokens.
The ending character or characters to use.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 虽然在生成插入、 更新或删除操作后无法更改或属性, 但你可以在调用 DataAdapter 的`Update`方法之后更改其设置。Although you cannot change the or properties after an insert, update, or delete operation has been generated, you can change their settings after calling the `Update` method of a DataAdapter.

exception.span: 当生成 Insert、Update 或 Delete 命令后，不能更改此属性。

span.span: This property cannot be changed after an insert, update, or delete command has been generated.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RefreshSchema() cil managed

summary.span: 清除与此命令生成器关联的命令。

span.span: Clears the commands that are associated with this command builder.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string SchemaSeparator { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property SchemaSeparator As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ SchemaSeparator { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SchemaSeparator : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要用作架构标识符和任何其他标识符之间的分隔符的字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the character to be used for the separator between the schema identifier and any other identifiers.

value.span: 要用作架构分隔符的字符。

span.span: The character to be used as the schema separator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 数据库服务器通过将标识符中的架构名称与一个字符隔开, 来指示标识符的架构。Generally, database servers indicate the schema for a identifier by separating the schema name from the identifier with some character. 例如, SQL Server 使用句点, 创建完整的标识符 (如 CustomerName), 其中 "Person" 是架构名称, 而 "CustomerName" 是标识符。For example, SQL Server uses a period, creating complete identifiers such as Person.CustomerName, where "Person" is the schema name and "CustomerName" is the identifier. 设置此属性可让开发人员修改此行为。Setting this property lets developers modify this behavior.

Public Overrides Function UnquoteIdentifier (quotedIdentifier As String) As String

param.name: quotedIdentifier
param.span: 其嵌入引号将被移除的标识符。

span.span: The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.

summary.span: 给定了带引号的标识符时，返回该标识符的正确的不带引号的形式。

span.span: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier.

summary.span: 这包括正确地非转义该标识符的所有嵌入的引号。

span.span: This includes correctly unescaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.

returns.span: 未加引号的标识符，其嵌入的引号已正确进行非转义。

span.span: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes properly unescaped.
